Question: Thirteen months after his marriage to this person, Marshall died at age 90 on August 4, 1995, in Houston.
Hints: After the coroner labeled the death "reserved," this person hired forensic pathologist Cyril Wecht to perform a second autopsy.
A photograph of this person was used by New York magazine on the cover of its August 22, 1994 issue titled White Trash Nation.
This person's mother, Virgie Arthur, appealed the ruling but it was later denied and she was ordered to pay costs.
